testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by homeowners and businesses across South Florida

client1.name: Sarah Johnson
client1.text: HMT Roofing did an exceptional job on our tile roof replacement. Professional, timely, and the quality is outstanding. Highly recommend!

client2.name: Michael Rodriguez
client2.text: Excellent service for our commercial property. The team was professional and completed the project on time and within budget.

client3.name: Lisa Chen
client3.text: Outstanding workmanship and customer service. HMT Roofing has been our go-to contractor for multiple properties.

community.description: At HMT Roofing, we believe in giving back to the community that has supported us for over 25 years. We're proud sponsors of local youth sports teams and regularly participate in community improvement projects.

detailedSystems.title: Our Roofing Systems
detailedSystems.subtitle: Discover the perfect roofing solution for your home or business with our comprehensive range of high-quality systems

metal.title: Metal Roofing System
metal.description: Metal roofs have become popular for both residential and commercial applications. The life cycle of a metal roof can last anywhere between 40 to 70 years, more than doubling that of traditional asphalt. Metal roofs also provide added protection from the elements, including hail, heavy rains, and high winds.

benefits.lasting: Built to Last 40-70 Years, Compared to 12-25 for Most Asphalt Roofs
benefits.colors: Available in a Large Selection of Colors to Fit Your Desired Style
benefits.maintenance: Require Less Ongoing Maintenance than Other Roofing Systems
benefits.impervious: Impervious to Rot, Mold, and More

flat.title: Flat Roofing System
flat.description: While flat roofs are traditionally seen on commercial properties, any flat or low-slope roof can benefit from a flat roof system. A flat roof's ability to keep your structure watertight is important in avoiding costly water damage or continued maintenance to protect your home or business.

benefits.efficiency: Enjoy Energy Efficiency and Lower Utility Costs
benefits.versatile: Are Versatile for Both Residential and Commercial Applications
benefits.space: Less Wasted Space - Added Area is Well-Suited for Solar Panels, Usable Rooftop Space, and More

tile.title: Tile Roofing System
tile.description: Tile roofing systems offer exceptional durability and aesthetic appeal, making them an excellent choice for various architectural styles and climates.

benefits.shedding: Excellent for Shedding Water in Rain Prone Climates
benefits.lasting: Tile Systems Are Long Lasting with Regular Maintenance
benefits.winds: Durable Enough to Withstand High Winds
benefits.impervious: Impervious to Rot, Insects, and More
benefits.recyclable: Made from Recyclable and Eco-Friendly Materials
benefits.variety: Available in a Variety of Choices and Colors to Match Your Home

asphalt.title: Asphalt Shingle Roofing System
asphalt.description: Asphalt shingles remain one of the most popular roofing choices due to their versatility, affordability, and proven performance across various weather conditions.

benefits.lasting: Asphalt Roofing Systems Are Long Lasting
benefits.affordable: Easy to Install and More Affordable Than Metal or Tile
benefits.variety: Available in a Variety of Styles and Colors
benefits.repairs: Most Common Issues Can be Repaired Easily
benefits.reputation: Long-Standing Reputation for Quality and Reliability

coating.title: Roof Coating System
coating.description: Roof coating is a cost-effective solution that can extend the life of your existing roof while providing enhanced protection and energy efficiency.

benefits.leaks: Stops Active Water Leaks and Prevents Future Damage
benefits.costEffective: More Cost-Effective Than a Full Roof Replacement
benefits.seamless: Provides a Seamless, Watertight Barrier for Your Roof
benefits.install: Easy to Install with Minimal Disruption
benefits.integrity: Maintains and Preserves the Integrity of Your Roofing System

cta.title: Ready to Choose Your Perfect Roofing System?
cta.subtitle: Our experts are here to help you select the ideal roofing solution for your specific needs and budget

process.title: Our Service Process
process.subtitle: From initial consultation to project completion

inspection.title: Inspection
inspection.description: Comprehensive roof inspection and assessment to identify issues and determine the best solution.
inspection.details: Our certified inspectors will thoroughly examine your roof structure, materials, and overall condition.

estimate.title: Estimate
estimate.description: Detailed written estimate with material specifications and transparent pricing breakdown.
estimate.details: Receive a comprehensive quote with no hidden fees and detailed explanation of recommended work.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Professional installation by certified technicians using premium materials and proven techniques.
installation.details: Expert installation with attention to detail, safety protocols, and minimal disruption to your property.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.description: Comprehensive warranty coverage and ongoing support for your peace of mind.
warranty.details: Full warranty protection with responsive customer service and maintenance support when needed.
